sections.text:
55-140.National Guard; oaths; commissioned officers may administer.

All commissioned officers of the Nebraska National Guard shall be authorized and empowered to administer oaths and affirmations necessary for the administration of military business.

SourceLaws 1909, c. 90, § 63, p. 384;R.S.1913, § 3962;C.S.1922, § 3360;C.S.1929, § 55-179;R.S.1943, § 55-119;Laws 1969, c. 459, § 38, p. 1594;Laws 1993, LB 170, § 3.
